text: Zisas vuim, mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi vhen ndav kegi guma, ana phorgɨv ŋgɨr zav khaŋ tɨgap ana nzuai. Ana nzuaim, Zisas ana thɨvav khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu taagip wo fek gu tari han wo phenan ŋgɨv, Fhe Bakɨme guigira ndun kurkurav ndu muuŋgi bigi bun mbe suaŋri.” Zisas maaŋ mba guma ga suaŋgim, ana taagiap wo phenan vov, ana mba Fhe Bakɨme guigira anan kurkurav ana muuŋgi bigi, ana za nta bun mba ŋgu bakɨmen ki gumgi gu mbigi ga suaŋgi.
